author: Jon Azpiri
title: School closures in Metro Vancouver, Fraser Valley on Wednesday, Feb. 8
text:
February 8, 2017 12:46 am Updated: February 8, 2017 12:49 am School closures in Metro Vancouver, Fraser Valley on Wednesday, Feb. 8 By Jon Azpiri Online News Producer Global News 
WATCH: Environment Canada has upgraded its storm watch to a storm warning, saying an intense Pacific front will move in Wednesday afternoon. Heavy snowfall possibly combined with freezing rain could turn roads into a nightmare. What is this?
